title: Documentary Traces LeBron James' Basketball Beginnings
teaser: Before he turned pro, James got his start as an Ohio high school phenom. That history is the subject of a documentary airing tonight.
contentencoded:
Basketball fans in northeast Ohio are counting the days until local hoops hero Lebron James returns to the Cleveland hardwood next week.

Before he turned pro, James got his start as an Ohio high school phenom. That history is the subject of a documentary airing tonight on CNN.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, David C. Barnett of WCPN has more from Cleveland.

  • Read more on this story via WCPN
